message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While your offer is tempting, the value of this product is exceptionally high. I'm willing to come down slightly to $975,000. I believe this price accurately reflects its worth.

I understand that the product has a high value, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $925,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering our previous discussions.
